676040.name: Fantasy Grounds - Kith'takharos Simple Scenario Bundle (Savage Worlds)
676040.description:
Kith'takharos Simple Scenario Bundle
SW
Simple Scenarios are
set piece encounters or very short adventures the Gamemaster can insert
when needed to fill a gap or spice up an ongoing adventure. All three
Simple Scenarios for the Kith'takharos setting --KS10, KS11, and KS12--
have been gathered into one bundle.
Each Savage Worlds Simple Scenario contains a Fantasy Grounds II module and an accompanying 2 page PDF for an estimated 4-8 hours of playing time. The module contains all the information necessary to run the adventure. The PDF duplicates the contents of the module in an easy to read format.
The basic Kith'takharos Setting is available
for free in a rules agnostic format at .
KS10: Spider Hunt!
A foraging party stumbles
onto a new species of spider and ignites a hunt for the creature's fiery
web.
Two Order of the Jade
Leaf scouts retreat from newly discovered Harlass Orn ruins when confronted
by large red spiders. One of the scouts strikes a spark when his sword
scrapes a wall, which ignites a portion of the spider webs in a large
fireball. The characters are sent by the Order of the Jade Leaf to retrieve
samples of flammable spider web.
Spider Hunt! is a Simple Scenario designed for 3-5 Seasoned characters.
KS11: The Repository
A mysterious cavern
holds constructs inert since the end of an ancient war.
A thousand years ago,
the Harlass Orn thrived in the swamps surrounding Kith'takharos. At
the height of their achievements, the Harlass Orn fought a desperate
war against extra-dimensional creatures called Veilwalkers. The Veilwalkers
created numerous battle constructs and placed them in storage facilities
called repositories. The characters encounter a Veilwalker repository
that houses a cache of deactivated constructs.
The Repository is a Simple Scenario for 3-5 Veteran characters.
KS12: The Hideout
A fragment of an ancient bridge offers
a commanding view of the surrounding swamp--and a defensible refuge
for poachers.
Outlaws called poachers roam the swamps
and nearby river lands. Poachers continuously spar with the Order of
the Jade Leaf, waylaying shipments of swamp plant products, dodging
and fleeing patrols. They turn remote islands or forgotten ruins into
bases. The characters stumble upon a poacher hideout at the ruins of
a Harlass Orn bridge.
The Hideout is a Simple Scenario for 3-5 Novice to Seasoned characters.
